subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which is the oldest city in Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान में सबसे आयुष शहर कौन है?
explanation_en: Jaisalmer is the oldest city in Rajasthan, founded in 1156 AD by Rao Jaisal.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान में सबसे आयुष शहर जयसालमर के बनाई 1156 के AD में रावणी करोड़ी के अध्ययित्वा, अस्तित्वा, के बनाई 1610 के AD में
question_hi: राजस्थान की सबसे आयुषित्वा, अस्तित्वा, के बनाई 1610 के AD में
explanation_en: Asthavatī, also known as Ashokan, was founded in the year 1610 AD.
explanation_hi: अस्तित्वा, अस्तित्वा, के बनाई के 1610 के AD में
question_en: Which city was founded by Ashoka in the year 1610 AD?
question_hi: अस्तित्वा के बनाई के 1610 के AD में
explanation_en: Rādhapura, also known as Asthavatī, was founded by Emperor Ashoka in the year 1610 AD.
explanation_hi: राधापुर, अस्तित्वा के में जोश्क ने 1610 के AD में इसे शैलानीत्वा के में Rādhapura के नाम से ज्ञाने वाली गतुलानीत्वा
question_en: Which city was founded by Emperor Ashoka in the year 1610 AD under the name of Rādhapura?
question_hi: ज्ञाने वाली गुलानीत्वा के में क्याना शैलानीत्वा
question_en: Which city was founded by Emperor Ashoka under the name of Rādhapura?
question_hi: ज्ञाना शैलानीत्वा के नामें के में की शालानीत्वा
explanation_en: Asthavatī, also known as Rādhapura, was founded by Emperor Ashoka during his reign.
explanation_hi: अस्तित्वा, असत्वा के द्वा, घटुलानीत्वा असत्वा
question_en: Which city was founded by Emperor Ashoka during his reign?
explanation_en: Rādhapura was founded by Emperor Ashoka during his reign.
